tabfeed.paragraph: Hello! üòÅ This section is dedicated to improving your overall experience and your LinkedIn Homepage! Here, you can filter what you want to see or choose to see absolutely nothing for moments of focus!

options.label: Options:
options.colorpicker: üëàSelect a main color for your LinkedIn!
options.remove_by_keywords: Remove Feed Posts with those keywords
options.remove_postings_tooltip: Great for you who are addicted to LinkedInü§£
options.remove_by_keywords_tooltip: Will clean your feed so you don't get distracted with controversial posts üß†
options.suppress_notifications_tooltip: Will silence notifications and remove them visually, so you can focus on other things

tabjobs.paragraph: Hello!üòÅ This section is dedicated to helping you filter jobs in your Job search! Consider these as extra filters and not a replacement for LinkedIn!
tabjobs.reminder: Remember that this only removes visually, while the extension is enabled!

adjustments.title: Options for Jobs:
adjustments.navigate_tip: . Navigate and do your searches within that page.
adjustments.show_icons: Display site icons and full URL
adjustments.show_icons_tooltip: Displays a site icon and name next to the job.
adjustments.save_searches_tooltip: Saves your searches while you browse LinkedIn, avoiding the need to search in history.
adjustments.filter_domains_tooltip: Visually filters jobs based on your 'Domain List'.
adjustments.filter_companies_tooltip: Visually filters jobs based on your 'Company List'.
adjustments.remove_applied: Remove jobs I've already applied to (displayed as 'Applied')
adjustments.remove_promoted_tooltip: Visually removes jobs with the 'promoted' badge.
adjustments.domain_placeholder: Write here which site (domain) you don't want to see | Example: Site.com
adjustments.company_placeholder: Write here which company you don't want to see | Example: Company

tabconnections.paragraph: Hello!üòÅ This section is dedicated to helping you with your networking on LinkedIn!
tabconnections.reminder: Remember that this only works while the extension is enabled!
tabconnections.auto_connect_tooltip: Perfect for you who receives invites all the time üíñ

filterlist.general_tip: Here you can remove from filtering, simply hover over the desired item and remove if needed.
filterlist.searches_tip1: Tip: Hover over the search item to see the complete search.
filterlist.searches_tip2: Tip: Click on the item to automatically copy it to the clipboard (CTRL + V).
filterlist.search_placeholder: Search here for the item you want
filterlist.no_searches_tip: You can enable the option to save your searches to start viewing here.
filterlist.no_items_tip: you can start by adding in the settings tab.

ui.separate_keywords: Separate keywords with commas for better organization
ui.displays_storage_desc: Displays all stored extension data in console
